conversation.message_text: Leilo: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Leilo.
Leilo: Welcome to Leilo! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Leilo: Welcome to Club Leilo! Save with code MOBILE10. Click here to auto-apply it and shop now: https://kava.attn.tv/aNbQa0Rk9eUz
Leilo: Also, if you get a chance, don't forget to save our contact to get exclusive updates!

I can't see where my order: ORDER #D-27457

Delivered to. Says delivered but was not on my front/back porch or at any of my neighbors houses, checked my mailbox and not there either. Please see if you have a picture of where it delivered or refund me for the order. Thank you

Leilo: Sorry to hear that. Unfortunately, the carrier did not provide a photo of the delivery. If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!
I've already checked everywhere and I did not receive it

Leilo: Thank you for checking. Since the package was last handled by the carrier, it's best to reach out to them directly. Have you tried calling them? They should be able to help you locate your package.
This is what I got when I tried
Email and phone greyed out and unable to ask for help
Leilo: Thanks for sharing that with me, and so sorry for the trouble! Let me check on this with my team, and I'll get back to you as soon as I have more info available.

You have said that you'd let me know before and it's taken a long time, it shouldn't take this long to figure out where my order is or refund my money. I placed another order already to get the product but I would like an update or a refund ASAP
Or resend the order, I don't care which

Leilo: I'm really sorry for the long wait. I've sent another follow-up to ensure this is prioritized and will continue to monitor it closely. I'll reach out to you as soon as I have any information to share.

Leilo: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team, and we understand how important this is. Upon checking the tracking, it looks like your order was delivered near your front door. Can you please confirm if you were able to double-check around the area?

Here is a photo of where your order was delivered: https://kava.attn.tv/aqHXuakxeVOr

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. We're here to help!
I emailed you, that's not my porch, here is a picture of my front porch
I walked my whole block and can't find that porch

Leilo: Sorry about that! Did you send an email to Help@Leilo.com? If so, our team is doing everything to respond to each inquiry promptly. They should follow up with you soon. Please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.
No I received an email from info@drinkleilo.com

Leilo: You mentioned that you emailed us along with the picture of your front porch, correct? If so, please wait for some time; one of my colleagues will get back to you via email soon. Please check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there. 

If not, I'd be happy to send word again to the team and let you know when I hear back. Again, I'm sorry for the hassle and really appreicate your patience!
Can a refund just be issued?
Template used: "Angry customer - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 18:19:02.447

Leilo: Our team will investigate this and get back to you with a resolution. I totally understand where you're coming from, and what you're feeling right now is absolutely valid. I can assure you that our team is doing its best to handle the situation in the best way possible.

escalate: ESC if you don't have the answer to the cx question instead of saying you don't know or don't have info

For store item availability, use SPA shortcut

dos_and_don_ts: They occasionally run sign-up campaigns where cx text certain keywords (‚Äúreleases,‚Äù ‚Äúearly access‚Äù) to join a list. If a customer sends a similar keyword:

‚ûú If confirmed, close the convo, if not you can respond
All clothing is true to size unless otherwise stated on the product page
You can use these sizing charts for reference (for internal use only): https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kmra_vOwCJuHoAx9D4L4Qx95rxafHcrqn-ZGutfzLgg/edit?usp=sharing

Custom Gold Grillz: Thanks for getting in touch! I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. This definitely isn't the experience we wanted for you! Are you referring to Order #131990? If so, I can see that it has been delivered on Dec 23, 2025. If you haven't received it, the best way to handle this is to email us directly at support@customgoldgrillz.com or give us a call at (415) 413-4915, Monday - Friday 9 am - 5 pm PST. Our team is happy to help!

send_to_cs: Send to CS immediately if cx did not receive their order
Send to CS immediately for post purchase inquiries about the status of the mold, or issues with the molds
Send to CS for pricing inquiries
Send to CS if cx is looking for a more specific piece not available on the website
Send to CS if cx is asking for a code and we don't have one
escalate: No escalations for this client, send everything to CS
tone: Use Teeth instead of Pieces (e.g 8 teeth at the top)
templates: If the image is not coming through a second time, send Broken Image temp
For CUSTOM GRILLZ & ACCESSORIES INQUIRIES for models not available on the website use PS shortcut
For urgent concerns/delayed escalation response use PS shortcut
For delayed orders and the customer is frustrated use PS shortcut
For customer service use shortcut CS which has both the direct email/number
dos_and_don_ts: Do not use the order history as a reference to order status
If customers want to cancel their order always ask for the reason for cancellation
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend pre-made grillz! Upsell to fitted and custom grillz
When recommending an item, let the cx know they can customize their order on the product page
When recommending an item, ask the cx if they are working with a budget
Use LFG shortcut to gather information and provide recommendations when cx ask about:
